name: Fucker Gamer Scum Get Stabbed
description:
/!\ EPILEPSY WARNING /!\

This is my very first game, it is a very cute game, and I want you to like it.

Thank you!

Keys

L/R/U/D: is moving outright

WSAD: is moving disadvantageous

G: Mutilate

P: Restart

Esc: Exit

An unofficial sequel to John George Jones ZX spectrum games "go to hell", and, "soft & cuddly" .
